title: Gunpowder man
creator_credit: John Richardson and Eastern Suburb's Children's Film Group
brief_description: Two boys secretly build a Guy Fawkes. A third boy follows them, discovers their secret and reveals it to his friends. A fight for ownership ensues but stops when the Guy collapses. All join together to re-react it and happily share the firing on Guy Fawkes night.
